attributes.action: make a posthumous award of The George Cross to Joseph Nwabuko
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Joseph Nwabuko, a 28-year-old student from Walsall, was shot dead by armed robbers, when he followed them with a view to obtaining information to help the police.
He put his life at risk through his community spirit and his sacrifice should be officially recognised.
